description: Contract to provide a hybrid digital platform for Canadian Congress on Disability Inclusion 2023.",
full_summary:
### Canadian Congress on Disability Inclusion (CCDI) 2023 Hybrid Event Digital Platform 
### Plateforme numérique pour l’événement virtuel hybride du Congrès canadien sur l’inclusion des personnes en situation de handicap (CCIH)

#### Tender Announcement Details
| **Parameter** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01014524 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | 100021925 |
| Publication Date | November 28, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | January 6, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. |
| Amendment Date | December 26, 2022 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | TBA |
| Expected Contract End Date | TBA |
| Tender Status | Expiré (Expired) |

#### Project Overview
The employment and social development department of Canada seeks to employ the services of a contractor to provide a hybrid digital platform for the implementation of the Canadian Congress on Disability Inclusion (CCDI) 2023.

#### Technical Specifications
* Telecommunications/Digital Data Network (G.S.I.N. Classification: N5805029)
* No security requirements
* Proposer is required to meet the requirements of the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Proposed period of contract: from contract award to 12 months after

#### Contracting Details
| **Parameter** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity | Employment and Social Development Canada |
| Contact Person | Mathieu Caron, nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca |

**Tender documents are attached.**
You can view the [documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/28/6f97842c2e270be6ea72440f55291340/100021925-0-en.pdf) [in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/26/756cc8155665529dc91a393f1d72a28d/qa-4-en.pdf) and [in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/26/a24ac6b71b1ac8ae6b35ca45331b2034/qr-4-fr.pdf)

**Note**
